segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the type and function of the message and to transmit the identifying number.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date(s) and time(s) applying to the whole message.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or processable supplementary information. In computer-to-computer exchanges free form text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify a reference relating to the whole message and its date and time.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to express a reference which applies to the entire message, e.g. rate note/commodity item number.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify the routing and date for the rate information.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify a location, e.g. place of departure/arrival.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date(s) and time(s) related to the location.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to identify a party and related contacts.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address and function.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to identify a contact and its communications related to the party.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within the party.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to specify the transport and rate selection criteria and to indicate the rate information being provided.

segment.name: Details of transport
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to indicate information related to the mode and means of transport, e.g. specific carrier.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date(s) and time(s) relating to the transport details.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate a location relating to the transport details.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a reference relating to the transport details.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment to indicate the currency in which the charges/rates are expressed.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to indicate an applicable weight or volume.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to specify the rate information selection criteria and to indicate the rate information being provided.

segment.name: Transport charge/rate calculations
segment.documentation: TCC, A segment to specify a charge/rate, e.g. freight rate.

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of units to which the unit price/rate applies.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, A segment to specify the applicable reduction or surcharge percentage details.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment to specify a quantity relevant to calculate the charge, e.g. chargeable quantity.

segment.name: Price details
segment.documentation: PRI, A segment to specify the price information of the charge.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to specify the monetary amount related to the charge.
